labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Discord will try to install an update and quit. - By switching back to a user with administrator privileges, it is possible to open the software, which shows a dialogue box about updating Discord or installing a helper app. This is blocked from appearing for the standard user.
data.expected_result: Discord asks for administrator privileges (preferred) OR Discord quits with an error message that the software needs to be updated under administrator privileges.
data.short_description: When running as a standard user (ie without admin privileges), updates of Discord quietly fail and blocks the application from opening.
data.steps_to_repro: -  Install a previous version of Discord on Mac OS X (this tested on 10.13.2). Do not open the application! - Create a standard user - Switch to the standard user - Open Discord
